about_the_game:
Rock Paper Scissors ULTIMATE is a roguelike deckbuilder that features the classic gameplay of the "Rock, Paper, Scissors" but with the ability to enhance the offensive and defensive stats while maintaining the hit points of each tool by using different types of cards.

Rock beats Scissors,
Scissors beats Paper,
Paper beats Rock.

Their offensive and defensive abilities, as well as the gameplay actions and reactions can be modified by placing certain cards in the tools' representative panel slots.

The four type of cards:

  • Clubs: enhances the damage dealing abilities.
  • Spades: affects the defensive capabilities.
  • Hearts: hit points related skills.
  • Diamonds: magic tricks.

Carefully selecting cards based on SYNERGIES makes the tools significantly more powerful.

You will need to play on the synergies, since opponents must be defeated within a certain number of rounds, and as the game progresses they get tougher with more and more dirty tricks up their sleeves.
The number of rounds that can be played in a set can be selected from the randomly given dices. Got some strong combo in your hand? Pick a high round number. Got unlucky pulls? Go for a lower one.

Make sure you pick the right cards for the right slots and choose an appropriate round number, since the selection of Rock, Paper or Scissors will be random for you and your opponent as well.

Collected some money along the way? Feel free to spend it in the shop where stat boosters, other cards and services can be purchased. Or spin the slot machine for a small fee to win something small or big.

One more thing.

Try not to lose any from the Rock, Paper, Scissors trio, since winning without having all of them is very difficult...






But given the right synergies...
